metadata.title: CVE-2020-9359 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
KDE Okular before 1.10.0 allows code execution via an action link in a PDFdocument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9359` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libokular5core10 - 4:19.12.3-2ubuntu1
okular - 4:19.12.3-2ubuntu1
okular-extra-backends - 4:19.12.3-2ubuntu1
okular-mobile - 4:19.12.3-2ubuntu1
qml-module-org-kde-okular - 4:19.12.3-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: okular package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:19.12.3-2ubuntu1').
